desc: Trust your most comfortable sleep to a Simply Perfect mattress. Proudly local, made in Kitchener-Waterloo. We’ve invested our 50 years of engineering the perfect foam mattress for your best night’s sleep.

layout.text:
The day you’ve been dreading has finally come—you’ve fallen out of love with your current mattress. Maybe you’re still trying to make it work with the lumps and creaky springs, and we get it, because shopping for a new mattress can be overwhelming. So many choices, features, not to mention the cost—when all you’re really looking for is a comfortable sleep.
What if we told you there was a way to get the mattress of your dreams, support an established local business in your community, and feel confident that your investment is protected, all while getting your best night’s sleep?
Yes. Your decision really can be that simple.

Welcome.
Let us show you why you can trust your most comfortable sleep to a Simply Perfect mattress.
